snippet: DIAMOND--Gerald, 88, on February 4, 2016. Life partner, soulmate and wife of Susi, devoted father of Gayle Diamond Crespy and dear father-in-law of Scott Crespy, grandfather of Hannah and Leah. Jerry will be missed by his extended family and friends. Service Sunday, February 7, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in his memory may be made to Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society, or the World Jewish Congress. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DIAMOND--Gerald, 88, on February 4, 2016. Life partner, soulmate and wife of Susi, devoted father of Gayle Diamond Crespy and dear father-in-law of Scott Crespy, grandfather of Hannah and Leah. Jerry will be missed by his extended family and friends. Service Sunday, February 7, 12 noon at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in his memory may be made to Hebrew Immigrant Aid Society, or the World Jewish Congress. 1/3
